CodeChunks.CodeChunk: SpellData data; if (!Core.Me.HasAura(225) && ActionManager.CurrentActions.TryGetValue(227, out data) && ActionManager.CanCast(data, Core.Me)) ActionManager.DoAction(227, Core.Me);
